## Why? *Posture* changes the input

| Parameter | Crawling Infant | Walking Infant |
|-----------|-----------------|----------------|
| Eye height| 0.30 m          | 0.60 m         |
| Locomotor speed | 0.33 m/s  | 0.61 m/s       |
| Head tilt | 20 deg          | 9 deg          |
